page.title: 20Conclusions
page.content: We, at Godalming Middle School have greatly enjoyed our participation in the Domesday Project. 71 children all aged 11 have been involved to varying degrees. We divided into small groups of four and interviewed various people at the principal features we had defined. As a result we found we received on overwhelming response of enthusiasm from all areas of the community. We haved tried to portray a picture of life in our block as we found it in June 1985 but no words can convey the dynamic community atmosphere which prevails. The area seems a very happy one probably insulated to a degree from the current economic and social problems to be found in other areas of the country. We thank all those who have helped to make our project a success.
